mapper.insert: insert into itrip_order_link_user( orderId, linkUserId, linkUserName, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy) values( #{orderId}, #{linkUserId}, #{linkUserName}, #{creationDate}, #{createdBy}, #{modifyDate}, #{modifiedBy})
